meta.title: PORTOFOLIO_ by siddharthmhjn.com
meta.description: Tony Stark - Genius, Billionaire, Philanthropist. CEO of Stark Industries and Iron Man. Building technology to protect the world and power the future.

paragraphs.text: I AM IRON MAN! Genius inventor, CEO of Stark Industries, and founding member of the Avengers. Building technology that protects the world.

My engineering philosophy: if it doesn't exist, I'll invent it. Built the first suit in a cave with a box of scraps. Created J.A.R.V.I.S., pioneered arc reactor technology, and cracked time travel when everyone said it was impossible.

items.title: IRON MAN ARMOR SERIES
items.description: 85+ iterations of powered exoskeleton suits with flight, weapons, AI integration, and bleeding-edge nanotech. Built the first one in a cave.

items.title: J.A.R.V.I.S. AI SYSTEM
items.description: Just A Rather Very Intelligent System. Advanced AI managing suit operations, security, and eventually becoming Vision.

items.title: ARC REACTOR TECHNOLOGY
items.description: Miniaturized particle accelerator providing clean, unlimited energy. Powers suits, buildings, and the future of humanity.

items.title: TIME-SPACE GPS
items.description: Quantum realm navigation device enabling time travel. Used to retrieve Infinity Stones and save half the universe.

items.title: CEO & LEAD INVENTOR
items.description: Transformed company from weapons manufacturer to clean energy leader. Invented arc reactor, created 85+ Iron Man suits, pioneered AI systems.

items.title: FOUNDING MEMBER
items.description: Co-founded Earth's Mightiest Heroes. Led defense of New York, created Ultron (learning experience), defeated Thanos. Made the sacrifice play.

items.title: QUANTUM ENGINEER
items.description: Cracked time travel when everyone said impossible. Designed Time-Space GPS. Enabled Avengers to retrieve Infinity Stones and save half the universe.

items.name: STEVE ROGERS
items.quote: The most annoying person I've ever met, but also one of the bravest. When it mattered most, he made the sacrifice play.

items.name: PEPPER POTTS
items.quote: Behind the armor was the most selfless person I've ever known. I watched him grow from having everything to giving everything.

items.name: PETER PARKER
items.quote: Mr. Stark believed in me when no one else did. He gave me a chance and showed me what it really means to be a hero.

contact.description: Got a world-ending threat? Need clean energy solutions? Want to license arc reactor tech? Reach out - Pepper will probably respond!

formFields.messagePlaceholder: Describe your project, threat level, or business proposal...

footer.tagline: Genius, Billionaire, Philanthropist. CEO of Stark Industries and Iron Man. Building technology to protect the world.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: Stark Industries collects information you provide through our contact forms. Unlike certain government agencies, we respect your privacy and don't have a helicarrier scanning your communications.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: Information collected is used to respond to inquiries about Stark Industries products and services. We do not sell your data - we're not that kind of company anymore.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: Your data is protected by the same security systems that guard the Iron Man suits. F.R.I.D.A.Y. monitors all access attempts 24/7.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.content: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. They're less intrusive than Ultron, I promise.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.content: Questions about privacy? Contact Pepper Potts at Stark Industries. She handles these things better than I do.

sections.heading: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing this website, you agree to these terms. It's a lot simpler than the Sokovia Accords, trust me.

sections.heading: Use of Content
sections.content: All content including arc reactor schematics, suit designs, and AI code is proprietary to Stark Industries. Unauthorized reproduction will result in a visit from Legal... or worse, Pepper.

sections.heading: Contact Form
sections.content: When using the contact form, provide accurate information. No, you cannot order an Iron Man suit. Stop asking.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Stark Industries is not responsible for any alien invasions, rogue AI, or time travel paradoxes that may occur while visiting this site.

sections.heading: Changes to Terms
sections.content: These terms may be updated. Continued use constitutes acceptance. Unlike the Avengers roster, these changes are usually less dramatic.
